title: Update regarding BlockChain Verify
story_body:
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY, INC. PROVIDES ROUTINE UPDATE

At 08:00:00 EST, Blockchain Verify, Inc. (BLK) issued a routine update to stakeholders.

Personnel Update:
Blockchain Verify, Inc. announced that Ms. Rachel Lee has been appointed as Senior Manager, Business Development, effective immediately. Ms. Lee will report to the Director of Business Development.

Marketing Update:
Blockchain Verify, Inc. confirmed its participation in the upcoming 2023 FinTech Conference, scheduled to take place on April 17-19, 2023, in New York City. The company will showcase its latest product offerings at Booth #123.

ESG Update:
Blockchain Verify, Inc. reported that it has maintained its carbon neutral status for the quarter ended March 31, 2023, in accordance with its Environmental Policy. The company also confirmed its ongoing commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

No further information was disclosed.
